abstract: The Day: The jury in the trial of Barbara Sheehan found no incompatibility in sanctioning the battered-woman defense but not accepting that it took 2 guns and 11 bullets to make her feel safe. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.

headline.main: Two Guns, 11 Bullets and a Jury Threading a Needle
